components.content:
In this section, we'll ask about:

  • confirmation your organisation adheres to the government code of conduct
  • confirmation your organisation has a data handling process in place
  • confirmation you have a bank account set up for your organisation
  • confirmation your organisation's safegaurding policies are up to date
  • confirmation that the information you have provided is accurate

name: Apply for funding to support children and young people on pathways to the UK from Ukraine, Hong Kong and Afghanistan
